metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: AppML Tutorial
AppML Brings Data to HTML
content.html: AppML Brings Data to HTML

content.text: "No Nonsense Web Applications"
content.html: "No Nonsense Web Applications"

content.text: Introduction
The Web is growing fast, and the amount of data in Cyberspace is growing even faster.
content.html: The Web is growing fast, and the amount of data in Cyberspace is growing even faster.

content.text: Every day new information systems are developed, and every day new users are connected, and data can be accessed 24/7 from anywhere in the world.
content.html: Every day new information systems are developed, and every day new users are connected, and data can be accessed 24/7 from anywhere in the world.

content.text: Faster and better software development methods are desperately needed .
content.html: Faster and better software development methods are desperately needed.

content.text: Along these lines, W3Schools has developed a very flexible technique for retrieving, displaying, and manipulate data, without the need for traditional programming.
content.html: Along these lines, W3Schools has developed a very flexible technique for retrieving, displaying, and manipulate data, without the need for traditional programming.

content.text: Cooperating with Jan Egil Refsnes, W3schools has developed a vocabulary for defining Web applications. The vocabulary is called AppML (Application Modeling Language).
content.html: Cooperating with Jan Egil Refsnes, W3schools has developed a vocabulary for defining Web applications. The vocabulary is called AppML (Application Modeling Language).

content.text: AppML uses the most up-to-date techniques and ideas of modern Web development with focus on:
content.html: AppML uses the most up-to-date techniques and ideas of modern Web development with focus on:

content.text: AppML supports the functions you find in other frameworks like React, Angular, and Vue, but AppML is much easier to use, and much easier to understand.
content.html: AppML supports the functions you find in other frameworks like React, Angular, and Vue, but AppML is much easier to use, and much easier to understand.

content.text: What is AppML?
AppML stands for App lication M odeling L anguage.
content.html: AppML stands for Application Modeling Language.

content.text: AppML is not a programming language. It is descriptive language (a language for describing applications).
content.html: AppML is not a programming language. It is descriptive language (a language for describing applications).

content.text: It is built around familiar Web application concepts like:
content.html: It is built around familiar Web application concepts like:

content.text: AppML runs in any HTML page. No installation is required.
content.html: AppML runs in any HTML page. No installation is required.

content.text: AppML is a tool for bringing data to HTML applications:
content.html: AppML is a tool for bringing data to HTML applications:

content.text: Objects JSON Files Text Files XML Files PHP/MySQL
content.html:
Objects JSON Files

Text Files XML Files

PHP/MySQL

content.text: Why AppML?
HTML is not very suitable for describing web applications.
content.html: HTML is not very suitable for describing web applications.

content.text: AppML is made for web applications:
content.html: AppML is made for web applications:

content.text: AppML is very easy to understand and extraordinarily quick to develop.
content.html: AppML is very easy to understand and extraordinarily quick to develop.

content.text: AppML Example
This example shows how easy AppML can bring data to HTML:
content.html: This example shows how easy AppML can bring data to HTML:

content.code:
Customers

 
Customer City Country
{{CustomerName}} {{City}} {{Country}}
content.code_html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en-US">

<title>Customers</title>
<link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css">
<script src="https://www.w3schools.com/appml/2.0.3/appml.js"></script>

<body>
<h1>Customers</h1>

<table appml-data="customers.js">
<tr>
  <th>Customer</th>
  <th>City</th>
  <th>Country</th>
</tr>
<tr appml-repeat="records">
  <td>{{CustomerName}}</td>
  <td>{{City}}</td>
  <td>{{Country}}</td>
</tr>
</table>

</body>
</html>

content.text: AppML is a tool for easy, rapid, and agile web application development.
content.html: AppML is a tool for easy, rapid, and agile web application development.

content.text: Easy and Agile
On today's market, there are many frameworks (tools or libraries) designed to extend HTML.
content.html: On today's market, there are many frameworks (tools or libraries) designed to extend HTML.

content.text: Most of these frameworks manipulate HTML, CSS or JavaScript in a way that makes them difficult to use (especially when used in combination).
content.html: Most of these frameworks manipulate HTML, CSS or JavaScript in a way that makes them difficult to use (especially when used in combination).

content.text: AppML is different. You have full HTML, CSS, and JavaScript freedom.
content.html: AppML is different. You have full HTML, CSS, and JavaScript freedom.

content.text: AppML makes it easy to create Single Page Applications (SPA) in a very clean and efficient way.
content.html: AppML makes it easy to create Single Page Applications (SPA) in a very clean and efficient way.

content.text: Even if you have never worked with web development before, you will find AppML very easy to use.
content.html: Even if you have never worked with web development before, you will find AppML very easy to use.

content.text: If you are an experienced web developer, you will soon discover the power of AppML.
content.html: If you are an experienced web developer, you will soon discover the power of AppML.
